<small>Also see: [[H1932]]</small>

 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִנּוּן‎</span> **pronoun 3 masculine plural** ==they, those== (plural of <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הוּא‎</span>: [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִינּוּן‎</span>, feminine <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִינִּין‎</span>, e.g. [[Gen.3.7|Gen 3:7]]; [[Gen.6.2|Gen 6:2]] Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> feminine <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Talmud <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִינְהוֺ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִינְהֵי‎</span> (for <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִינְהוֺן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִינְהֵין‎</span>); Mandean <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הינון‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הינין‎</span>; — all from <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הוֺן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הֵן‎</span> with demonstrative Syll. <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הן‎</span> 'lo,' prefixed, [[BDB#W|W]]<sup>OG 98, 106</sup> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M 86</sup>); — ***they, those***, [[Dan.2.44|Dan 2:44]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מַלְכַיָּא אִנוּן‎</span> ***those kings***, [[Dan.6.25|Dan 6:25]] as accusative <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְמוֺ אִנוּן‎</span>, [[Dan.7.17|Dan 7:17]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎דִּי אִנוּן אַרְכַּע‎</span> ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]] feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִנִּין‎</span>) which are four ([[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>[[1Sam.10.19|1Sam 10:19]]</sup> [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 87,3</sup>), [[Ezra.5.4|Ezra 5:4]] . . . <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מָה אִנוּן שְׁמָהָת‎</span> = ***what are the names . . . ?*** ([[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>§ 201, 3, Obs.</sup>, [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>l.c.</sup>) compare <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הוּא‎</span>. 

 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִנִּין‎</span> ==they== (feminine) [[Dan.7.17|Dan 7:17]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] : [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִנּוּן‎</span>, above
